title.rendered: Specifiers Find Detailed Information About Eldorado On ARCAT.COM

content.rendered:
Every day, thousands of architects, spec writers, engineers and contractors use ARCAT.COM to find product data including CAD Details, specifications, and BIM objects from more than 10,000 building materials manufacturers. Eldorado Stone is now part of this no-cost, popular online resource.

Eldorado is the ONLY manufactured stone company to also offer BIM content on the site, which increases our chances of being specified. The BIM provides accurate, uniform and appropriate product data on all of our profiles, saving architects a significant amount of time doing data entry and product research—an added value that makes working with Eldorado even more desirable.

See Eldorado Stone on Arcat.com:
www.arcat.com/arcatcos/cos32/arc32221.html 

About Arcat.com:
-ARCAT was established in 1992 when the company published the first national directory of building product manufacturers with a circulation of 40,000 architects. Today, hundreds of thousands of specifiers rely on ARCAT for detailed and easily downloadable product information.
